title: SeaWorld Says Bid For Cedar Fair Was Rejected
sub_head: Both drop in after-hours trading after SeaWorld says it can’t see a path to a deal
body:
SeaWorld Entertainment Inc. signaled it was unlikely to pursue a deal for Cedar Fair LP after the latter rejected its approach, stymieing a takeover that would have combined two theme-park businesses that were hit by the Covid-19 pandemic.
Cedar Fair , whose parks include Cedar Point in Ohio, Knott’s Berry Farm in California and Schlitterbahn in Texas, earlier this month said it received an unsolicited offer from SeaWorld.
